name: Pyro Cartographer in the Depths of Hell
name_original: Pyro Cartographer in the Depths of Hell
description:
You have been hired by an elite group of adventurers to restore a map! Unfortunately, the map is in tiny pieces and said tiny pieces have been scattered throughout Hell. Fight your way through 15 levels to get through the baddies and recover the pieces of the map!

A game made for Dev Squad Jam over the course of 72 hours. Simple action-adventure game where you place fire traps and lure enemies into them, while getting to the map piece in each level.
